DOC.criteria: 1 . Females Males age 1875 without significant health problem determine Principal Investigator . 2 . Nonsmoker 3 . Ability understand inform consent 1 . Pregnancy 2 . Any serious unstable disease within 6 month ; seizure risk ; diabetes mellitus require insulin oral hypoglycemic medication ; diagnosis eat disorder , use MAOI prior 14 day ; hepatic renal impairment ; clinically significant cardiovascular disease within 6 month ; uncontrolled hypertension ; severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ; baseline systolic blood pressure high than150mm Hg diastolic blood pressure high 95 mm Hg ; history cancer ( except treat basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin ) ; history clinically significant allergic reaction laboratory abnormality , patient take AREDS Eye Vitamins . 3 . Major depressive disorder within past year require treatment ; history panic disorder , psychosis , bipolar disorder , eat disorder 4 . Intention donate blood blood product treatment phase study ; 5 . Alcohol drug abuse/dependency within past year 6 . Use tobacco product cigarettes use marijuana 7 . Body mass index ( calculate weight kilogram divide square height meter ) less 15 great 38 weight less 45.5 kg 8 .
